Poisons (Application of Uniform Standard) Order 2021

I make the following order under section 14(2) of the Poisons Act 1971 .

20 July 2021

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Health

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Poisons (Application of Uniform Standard) Order 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    The Acts Interpretation Act 1931 applies to the interpretation of this order as if this order were by-laws.

4. Amendment of Uniform Standard
    The Uniform Standard, in its application to Tasmania, is amended by omitting from Schedule 8 the item relating to cannabis and adding the following item:
    Cannabis (including seeds, extracts, resins and the plant, and any part of the plant) when –
                                                                                                
    
            (a) prepared or packed for human therapeutic use, when –
                    (i) cultivated or produced, or in products manufactured, in accordance with the Narcotic Drugs Act 1967 of the Commonwealth; or
                    (ii) for use in products manufactured in accordance with the Narcotic Drugs Act 1967 of the Commonwealth; or
                    (iii) imported as therapeutic goods, or for use in therapeutic goods, for supply, in accordance with the Therapeutic Goods Act 1989 of the Commonwealth; or
                    (iv) in therapeutic goods, supplied in accordance with the Therapeutic Goods Act 1989 of the Commonwealth, except when –
                            (A) it is in a product to which item 4, 8, 10, 11 or 12 of Schedule 5A to the Therapeutic Goods Regulations 1990 of the Commonwealth applies; or
                            (B) the therapeutic goods are separately specified in the nabiximols entry in this Schedule; or
                            (C) the cannabidiol entry in Schedule 3, or Schedule 4, applies to the therapeutic goods; or
            (b) used in research or development of products for human therapeutic use, where –
                    (i) it is used by the holder of a licence granted and in force under section 16 of the Poisons Act 1971 or regulation 11 of the Poisons Regulations 2018; and
                    (ii) the conditions of the licence specifically authorise the use.

    5. Legislation revoked
        The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is revoked.

    SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation revoked

    Clause 5

    Poisons (Application of Uniform Standard) Order 2018 (No. 90 of 2018)
                                                                         
    

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 28 July 2021

    This order is administered in the Department of Health.
